companions.content: data class Car(val id: Int, val name: String, val year: Int)
class CarRepository private constructor() { fun getCarList(): List<Car> { ... } }
class CarListActivity : AppCompatActivity() { override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState) setContentView(R.layout.activity_car_list) } }

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
    <ImageView android:id="@+id/car_image" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <TextView android:id="@+id/car_name" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</LinearLayout>

<resources>
    <string name="app_name">兰博基尼历史车型</string>
    <string name="car_list_title">历史车型</string>
</resources>

messages.content: 生成一个介绍兰博基尼历史上所有车型的app、要可以评论、可以点赞
